job_tasks.justification: The job title itself indicates a focus on software development.
The mention of an 'ML Platform team' implies responsibilities related to the operational aspects and infrastructure for machine learning.

classification.rationale: The job description is extremely brief and lacks specific technical details about AI or ML tasks. While it mentions an 'ML Platform team', it explicitly states 'ML background is not required', making it difficult to classify it as a specialized AI role.
